Package characters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bob
    The Bob class represents a Bob character that is drawn by an imported image and user controlled by the arrow keys.
    HealthBoost
    The HealthBoost class represents a health pack that is similar to a first aid kit for the characters, allowing them to "attack" as ways of healing 50 points of health on the map.
    Line
    The Line class represents a double-precision Line that can be drawn using the Processing library.
    Mario
    The Mario class represents a Mario character that is drawn by an imported image and user controlled by the arrow keys.
    Shape
    The Shape class represents a double-precision Shape that can be drawn using the Processing library.The Shape class is a superclass for the other 3 classes.
    Sprite  
    Weapon
    The Weapon class represents a laser gun that is a Sprite and Mario and Bobs can fire the Sprite once they pick it up as a special ability for a one time use that deals 200 damage at once on the other Sprite.
